title: Split Symmetry
description: Itâ€™s 2015. Dr Elena Lewis organises a charity hike in the notorious Gran Sasso mountain range in central Italy, but the presence on the hike of her estranged patient, James Dennison, unsettles her from the start.When the hike descends into chaos, Elena must work against the clock to save James and the other lost members of the group. Just as she is close to finding them, she is thwarted by the worst earthquake the region has ever known...A multi-layered metaphysical adventure which questions the nature of reality, Split Symmetry also tells the tale of how - when a woman is made to confront her feelings for a man with a dark secret - the question is posed: do our decisions in life define what we become?
author: Kirsten Arcadio
